byline: Adam Allington, Amy Scott, Dan Weissmann, Kai Ryssdal, Scott Tong and Mitchell Hartman
title: Marketplace for Monday November 24, 2014
description:
Update: Added some information on the St. Louis County grand jury, which has declined to charge Darren Wilson in the death of Michael Brown.

We devise a job description for a new Secretary of Defense that reflects the demands of the modern world. Plus, we examine the potential impact of the new immigration policy on higher and lower education.
